messages.message:
Not sure who I should be talking to about this, but trying to access a public IB workspace requires you to log in now. This is on prod.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Log out of IB (or use incognito)
2. Go to @Erick’s public workspace: https://instabase.com/erickfriis/recruiting-public/fs/Instabase%20Drive/interviewing/ocr-parse/
3. You’ll see “Something went wrong. Access Denied” in the left column (first picture attached)
4. Click on any file
5. You’ll see a log in prompt (second picture attached)
cc @John Hung @laura
Does the json file no longer load into codepad also?
With the content disposition raw flag? Assuming that’s requiring authentication too now. Maybe I should switch the interview prompt to rely on dogfood instead
the json file loads into coderpad fine!
Try switching off the os redesign flags to unblock you. fyi <!subteam^SQC4GLFN2>

Two things going on here:
1. Sometimes you get access denied for seeing the drives. I need to fix that, but it shouldn't be blocking
2. Json files now open automatically in Text Editor, which is why you're getting that error. If you want to see them in instabase, you should right click --> preview. I need to think on a solution for that...
Thanks @Jessica!! Can we track these somewhere? We use this functionality during a portion of our App Eng interviews. In the meantime, these workarounds look good :slightly_smiling_face:
